error.message: Class Drupal\editablevar\Twig\EditablevarExtension extends deprecated class Twig_Extension: since Twig 2.7, use "Twig\Extension\AbstractExtension" instead
Instantiation of deprecated class Twig_SimpleFunction: since Twig 2.7, use "Twig\TwigFunction" instead
Parameter $env of method Drupal\editablevar\Twig\EditablevarExtension::editablevar() has typehint with deprecated class Twig_Environment: since Twig 2.7, use "Twig\Environment" instead
Value of core_version_requirement: ^8.8 || ^9 is not compatible with the next major version of Drupal core. See https://drupal.org/node/3070687.
